name: DeathWish (AbhinavChemikala)
description: DeathWish is an open-world horror game that is made by unity engine. the story of the game is, the player has to find clues and enter a house and has to burn all the dolls in order to escape. there will be a time limit after entering the house. if the player fails to burn all dolls within the time limit then the ghost will kill the player and game over.
